name: Verify search results for unavailable products
scenarioId: search/search_product:Verify search results for unavailable products
methodName: Verify search results for unavailable products

testSteps.description: 1: Verify search results for unavailable products ({item=car, status code=404, error message=Not found})

children.description: Given 'George' wants to buy an item
When he performs search for an 'car'
George the api user executes a GET on the resource api/v1/search/demo/{keyword}

  </body>

children.description: Then he doesn't see the results
George the api user should see a value that is equal to: <"keep-alive">
And '404' and 'Not found' are shown for an 'car'
